name: Wall Walker
description:
You know in most VR games you get around with teleportation right? What happens if you try to teleport onto a wall? In most games it just fails, but what if instead, you actually teleport onto that wall?

Wall Walker takes this idea and runs with it; It uses perspective shifting as a mechanical core to explore a variety of mind bending concepts, forcing you to consider the world around you in ways you've never had to before.

Ohh you also get to throw cubes. Players love throwing the cubes.



Also, Since I can't figure out where else to put them:
